detail.description: Mahindra Lifespace Developers Ltd was incorporated in 1999, it is engaged in the business of development of the real estate, residential facilities, commercial complexes and through its subsidiary companies is involved in various infrastructure projects including the development of SEZs and Industrial Clusters. [1][2]
